title: New: La Plage – Mark
content:
New Honeymoon signees La Plage have been making some substantial waves over the past month with their infectiously captivating summery guitar pop.

New track Mark is a far cry from their bouncing debut Rendez Vous, replacing the jumping bass and drums with a subdued atmosphere that fully encapsulates. It’s a bleary affair that stays fairly flat dynamically, but drifts around  in a way that is seriously hard to ignore. Stream Mark below as well as their debut Rendez Vous below:
